title: Fifty Years of KdV: An Integrable System
abstract:
The author discusses integrability of Hamiltonian dynamical systems in the
aftermath of KdV. The author also discusses the role of integrable systems in
certain numerical computations, particularly the computation of the eigenvalues
of a random symmetric matrix.
